title: Walker Darkytown Rebellion content and response

content.question:
The work shown is Kara Walker’s Darkytown Rebellion, created in 2001 C.E.

Describe both the form and the content of the work.

Using specific evidence, explain how Walker used both the form and the content to elicit a response from her audience.

Explain how Walker drew a connection between historical and contemporary issues in Darkytown Rebellio

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
